title: Cyberpunk 2077 Review Round Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.07.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Cyberpunk 2077 reviews, Nintendo sending too many cease and desists, and more.

00:00:00 - Start
00:01:30 - Housekeeping
Our Cyberpunk 2077 review is live right now on YouTube and the Kinda Funny Gamescast podcast feed.
If you have any Cyberpunk questions, I may have answers and so that’s going to be this week’s episode of PS I Love You XOXO. Write in with all the questions you have and I’ll sit down with Greg to talk them through.
Andy is going to be streaming Cyberpunk 2077 showing off Ray Tracing and all that goodness on his Nvidia RTX 3080. That’s happening first on Thursday, December 10th from 1-3 pm PT and then again on Tuesday, December 15th from 11am-1pm PT on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames 
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:03:55 - Cyberpunk 2077 Review Round Up
00:14:50 - Consoles aren't available for testing 4 DAYS BEFORE RELEASE! WHAT THE FUCK?! Is this a glorious shitshow for everyone? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:24:20 - Nintendo Must be stopped - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:32:15 - Neil Druckmann has a new title - Wesley Yin-Poole @ EuroGamer
00:38:40 - Epic won't hold in-person Fortnite events in 2021 - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:42:40 -  Ad  
00:47:45 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:50:00 - What version of the game do you consider when judging? - Benjamin Berry
00:55:15 - I’m curious if you guys would like to see a sequel or some sort of DLC? - MangoJR
01:02:50 - Squad Up:Long Shlong Silver(Steam PC) - THE GLIZZY
01:05:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless and Imran
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
